General.Name: Berkosan Yalitim ve Tecrit Maddeleri Uretim ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Üretim Ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells insulation and isolation materials in Turkey and internationally. The company offers polyethylene, polypropylene, and cross-linked foams. It also provides a range of services, such as interstory screed application, wall and roof insulation, soundproofing and thermal insulation, refrigerated cooler vehicle insulation, air conditioning inside and outside tools, sound and vibration isolation, and heat and noise prevention in mechanical installations. The company sells its products under the Foamex, Polyberk, Proberk, Reflekt, Airpack, and Airfoam brand names. It provides its services to the companies in the construction/industrial, packaging, fittings, automotive, footwear/bags, sea products, children playgroup, and sports/entertainment sectors. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

1.Name: Mr. Enis  Aldikacti
